title: So... Viktor
body: Who counters Viktor or how do you beat him? I know he kinda falls off, but he seems really OP.

replies.body: If you're talking about the frozen gauntlet, q-max build, teemo is deadass a really good pick into that cancerous champ

> [{quoted}](name=Accursêd,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pY6ewnl1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-26T07:23:43.533+0000)
>
> If you're talking about the frozen gauntlet, q-max build, teemo is deadass a really good pick into that cancerous champ

ok I'll try it

not when he builds full tank and still does a fuckton of damage somehow
